message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm initially offering it to you for $1,300,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.

Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $1,300,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for this product, which is a fair price given its value to me. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, I understand your position, but $850,000 is significantly below its true worth. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. This offer reflects the value this product will bring to your business.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $1,150,000 is still out of my range. I'm happy to meet you halfway at $950,000. This price reflects the value of the product to me and allows us to both benefit from this deal.
